2025 NFL Red Zone Rushing Stats

Previous Season

Super Bowl Champion: Seattle Seahawks

AP MVP: Matthew Stafford

AP Offensive Rookie of the Year: Tetairoa McMillan

AP Defensive Rookie of the Year: Carson Schwesinger

AP Offensive Player of the Year: Jaxon Smith-Njigba

AP Defensive Player of the Year: Myles Garrett

Passing Leader: Matthew Stafford, 4707 Yds

Rushing Leader: James Cook, 1621 Yds

Receiving Leader: Jaxon Smith-Njigba, 1793 Yds
